description:
A stylish way to show your support for the LGBTQ+ community, Prana's Pride T-Shirt has a comfortable, responsibly-made design that fits perfectly into anyone’s weekly wardrobe.

There are plenty of reasons to wear this shirt with pride, but they particularly love the fact that it was made using an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend by their Fair Trade Certified™ factory partners. This means you can support the people who made it, take care of the planet, and share an important message as well.
name: Prana PrAna Pride T-Shirt - Mens
